alert.note: Alert for Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 7:07PM CDT until September 16 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 607 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grant, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grant, Madrid, Elsie and Wild Horse Spring. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 68 and 78. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
